metadata.name: ItemOtherPermissions
metadata.short-description: The world permissions of an item
metadata.discussion:
ItemOtherPermissions objects describe world permissions on an item.
To access this object, use the other property of the associated Item.
metadata.related: For user permissions, use <df-class>ItemUserPermissions</df-class>. For group permissions, use <df-class>ItemGroupPermissions</df-class>.

placeholder-values.placeholder: Change write and execute permissions in one call
